content.value:
Hi @MattHancock can you explain to me why Stanley Johnson, repeat Covid rule breaker, has had his second vaccine injection but my 80 year old care home resident and medically vulnerable father has not had his first? 

Is it because my family are not related to the Prime Minister?
content.html: Hi @MattHancock can you explain to me why Stanley Johnson, repeat Covid rule breaker, has had his second vaccine injection but my 80 year old care home resident and medically vulnerable father has not had his first? Is it because my family are not related to the Prime Minister?
